title: Skin idea Archer Varus (Fate Stay Night)
body:
Hey, I'm not sure if this is the right place to post this or if anyone will see this but I really think a lot of people would love a skin reference to Archer from fate stay night for varus as already they are quite similar and it would be very small alterations to clothing etc, the arch light skin already looks incredibly close to Archer. 
Anyway here is a link to a photo of Archer and sorry but I'm not good at drawing so I can't create a concept or anything.
If anyone could tell me a better place to submit this it would be great. 

-thanks

replies.body: If people hate the idea of there being an actual Archer skin for Varus then people who make customs skins should have a go at making it because i think its actually a good idea and the people who instantly ditch it should get their heads out of their arses.
Nope, horrible. Please try again next time, thank you for your co-operation - Riot Games

Archer doesn't even use a bow&arrow, save from like 1 occasion. It's almost like a tradition for Type Moon really, to have an Archer class that almost never touches a bow.

So I wouldn't say it's matching to put an Archer skin on Varus tbh.

Yeah true, but it would suit better than any other champion because of a resemblance already slightly present in varus, but they could always have the iconic daggers on his hip and take them out in a taunt like Malabar?.
As much I'd love to see this I can't imagine it happening perhaps as a custom mod skin though

Yeah, there is a custom skin for saber, it would be hard for this to happen but riot doesn't seem to shy from anime references like the new sailor moon (star Guardian) lux and the gurren lagaan (super galaxy) rumble and right now the new series of fate stay night unlimited blade works is very popular and some rioters might enjoy it as they have added even subtle anime references like ezreals dance (the melancholy of haruhi suzumiya) and dravens death animation "Bang"  (cowboy bebop) in the past, if someone high up sees this and likes it it could happen but hopes are not high for various reasons.

> [{quoted}](name=Aspicio,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AX0XXvRr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-24T15:15:00.106+0000)
>
> dravens death animation "Bang"  (cowboy bebop) in the past, 

The "Bang" pose didn't originate from Cowboy Bebop, nor was it made famous by it, the show just made it even more well known that's all.

Most western games have their concerns when it comes to putting anime references into their titles since well, apparently anime hate is a thing these days even though everyone and his dog were watching anime back in the 80s and 90s. So yer, most devs shy away from that as a result.

The Gurren Lagann Rumble took years of requesting to finally get onto LoL. But good work for Riot on the creation of Magical Girl Lux however, it certainly took me by surprise.

I really wish they can put maybe just a few more anime references into this game, seeing how anime is definitely one of the large integrals of popular culture and I wish they can be less worrying when it comes to opening up possibilities on this particular skin line.

**EDIT:** I think Fate, like Attack on Titan and Tokyo Ghoul, are a bit too overrated though (they certainly deserve praises but imo they are getting way more than they deserve). But that's just me. Still it would be a cool skin if they were to make one base on it, not sure if they will run into problems however as Fate itself is based on world mythology, folklores and history in the first place, most people would just go with the literature impressions instead of the anime illustrations.

Yeah, totally I know all about the Sigma behind anime hate, then again the same people that hate anime usually hate league of Legends and world of war craft for the same unjust reasons and regarding the overrated anime, I totally agree with you for Tokyo ghoul and attack on Titan but I honestly believe the newer ufotable animated fate series are actually brilliant especially for their takes on human ideologies and real world myths.

Archer Varus XD

Next you'll be telling me you are making a skin called Flaming Brand or Dragon Shyvana

Maybe even Rat Twitch
